definition: characterized by lightness and insubstantiality, any habitation at a high altitude
details:
adjective
- characterized by lightness and insubstantiality
= synonyms: airy
noun
- any habitation at a high altitude
= synonyms: aerie, eyrie, eyry
- the lofty nest of a bird of prey (such as a hawk or eagle)
= synonyms: aerie, eyrie, eyry
